title: Amistad II
description: The largest ship the world had ever known. Its 400 passengers and crew on a maiden voyage to a brave new world. A journey that would change their lives forever.
quote: I’m the king of the world!
altHero: a Black man on a boat raises his arms and yells triumphantly
alt1: a ship with large sails on the ocean
alt2: a bearded man in captain’s uniform
alt4: a large white man looks angry
